info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 26 at 1:45PM PDT until July 26 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTY... At 145 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated earlier thunderstorms had produced 1 to 2 inches of rain across the warned area. HAZARD...Flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Continued flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations included in the warning include... Willow Creek Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
